abstracts.cdata!:
The project comprises a two-year program
            of technical assistance and short-term consultancy services
            to help the Government design and implement policy measures.
            These measures are aimed at promoting growth in the non-oil
            sectors of the economy and formulating a more effective
            petroleum development strategy following the steep decline
            in oil prices. The project also seeks to help the Government
            in specific areas of public sector investment, finance, and
            external debt management. The principal benefit arising from
            the project is expected to be in the form of a set of
            actionable policy measures designed to reestablish
            creditworthiness and promote economic growth over the medium term.
